text: Talim Point is the southernmost tip of Talim Island, in Laguna de Bay — in the Binangonan municipality of Rizal province, Philippines. Both Talim Point and Talim Island itself were formed from volcanic activity. The caldera may have formed during at least two major explosive eruptions about 1 million and 27,000-29,000 years ago. == References== ==Other websites== * Talim Point National High School * Municipality of Binangonan Talim Point in Rizal province is different from Talin Point in Batangas province. title: Talim Point
